Fighting: (agi) d4 Repair: (sma) d4

Skill Notes:
Gallows Humor: May use Taunt vs. fear; Raise gives +1 to allies
Outsider: -2 Persuasion (other races)
Thin Skinned: -2 vs. Taunt
Size: 0
Advances: 8 Improvement Points: 20 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 10; Edge: 4; Skill: 6
Description Notes: Veteran Of The Dark World: +4 Advances
Features
Edges (3 points): Gallows Humor; Relentless; Veteran Of The Dark World Hindrances: Flashbacks+; Forlorn+; Outsider; Poverty; Suspicious; Thin Skinned Human Abilities: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Poverty: Starts with half funds and loses half of funds each wk
Relentless: Driven to pursue and defeat evil
Suspicious: Trusts no one
Veteran Of The Dark World: Has an additional hindrance
Combat
Parry: 4 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 7 (1) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Thick Coat Shield: None Weapons: Browning Automatic Rifle (2d8 R20" AP 2); Spencer Carbine (2d8 R20" AP 2); Streetsweeper (3d6 R12"); Unarmed (d8+d0)

Fighting Parry Modifier: +2 Parry
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Flashbacks+: Drawing a club Action Card inflicts Distracted
Relentless: May take an action at a -2 penalty when Shaken
